title: Potato salad with fresh salmon and tiger prawns
description: This colourful salad is light yet substantial and with lots of lovely contrasting textures. Perfect for a summer buffet – just serve with green salad leaves.
ingredients: 3 x 125g/4½oz middle-cut salmon fillets, skin on
16 cooked tiger prawns in their shells
1 bunch of spring onions, thinly sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
